subject: Coaches and Managers
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Nets have gone 3-1 since their change of coaches and seem happy to stick with P. J. Carlesimo — though Phil Jackson is said to be No. 1 on their wish list.
snippet: The Nets have gone 3-1 since their change of coaches and seem happy to stick with P. J. Carlesimo — though Phil Jackson is said to be No. 1 on their wish list.
